00035 RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::Logger(){
00036   logLevel=LL_INFO;
00037   logType=LOG_BOTH;
00038 
00039   fileName="RainbruRPG.log";
00040 
00041   // Possible Segfault if omitted
00042   oss.str("");
00043 
00044   openFile();
00045 };

00048 // id 1=II, 2=WW, 3=EE
00062 void RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::log( const char* file, 
00063                                          const char* line, int id, 
00064                                          const char* msg){
00065   char* c;
00066 
00067   if (id>=logLevel){
00068     switch(id){
00069       case 1: c="II"; break;
00070       case 2: c="WW"; break;
00071       case 3: c="EE"; break;
00072     }
00073 
00074     string o= "  [";
00075     o += file;
00076     o += ":";
00077     o += line;
00078     o += "]\t";
00079     o += c;
00080     o += " ";
00081     o += msg;
00082 
00083     this->out( o );
00084   }
00085 }
00086 
00098 void RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::logAssert( const char* file, 
00099                                                const char* line, 
00100                                                bool b, const char* msg){
00101   char* c;
00102   bool l=false;
00103 
00104 
00105   if (b){
00106     c="II";
00107     if (logLevel==LL_INFO)
00108       l=true;
00109   }
00110   else{
00111     c="EE";
00112     l=true;
00113   }
00114 
00115   if (l){
00116     string o= "AA[";
00117     o += file;
00118     o += ":" ;
00119     o += line ;
00120     o += "]\t";
00121     o += c ;
00122     o += " ";
00123     o += msg ;
00124     this->out( o );
00125   }
00126 }

00144 void RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::out(std::string s){
00145 #ifndef WIN32
00146   if (logType==LOG_STDOUT||logType==LOG_BOTH)
00147     cout << s << endl;
00148 #endif  
00149 
00150   if (logType==LOG_FILE||logType==LOG_BOTH)
00151     file << s << endl;
00152 }

00159 void RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::setLogType(tLogOutType t){
00160   logType=t;
00161 }

00170 void RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::setFilename(const char*f ){
00171   if (file.is_open())
00172     file.close();
00173 
00174   fileName=f;
00175   openFile();
00176 }

00184 void RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::openFile(){
00185   file.open(fileName);
00186 
00187 #ifndef WIN32
00188   if (!file){
00189     cout << "  EE" << __FILE__ <<":"<< __LINE__, " LOGGER CAN'T OPEN FILE ";
00190     cout << fileName;
00191   }
00192 #endif
00193 }

00200   this->out(msg);

00209   oss.str("");

00220 void RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::logCat(const char* file, const char* line){
00221 
00222   string o="  [";
00223 
00224   o += file;
00225   o += ":" ;
00226   o += line ;
00227   o += "]\t-- ";
00228   o += oss.str() ;
00229   out(o.c_str());
00230 
00231   this->logCatFree();
00232 }
